name: @cesarchamal/single-spa-root
description: Single-spa application example which imports registered applications from NPM packages and manages authentication features as login.

scripts.lint:strict: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n AUTH,LAYOUT,HOME,ANG,VUE,REACT,VANILLA,WC,TS,JQ,SVELTE "npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app run lint" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vanilla-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-webcomponents-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-typescript-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-jquery-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-svelte-app run lint || exit 0"
scripts.lint:loose: concurrently -n AUTH,LAYOUT,HOME,ANG,VUE,REACT,VANILLA,WC,TS,JQ,SVELTE "npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vanilla-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-webcomponents-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-typescript-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-jquery-app run lint || exit 0" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-svelte-app run lint || exit 0"
scripts.start: npm run build:apps && npm run build && node server.js
scripts.prod:build:apps: npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app run build:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app run build:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app run build:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app run build:single-spa:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app run build:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app run build:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-vanilla-app run build:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-webcomponents-app run build:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-typescript-app run build:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-jquery-app run build:prod && npm --prefix ../single-spa-svelte-app run build:prod
scripts.prod:build:apps:concurrently: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n AUTH-B,LAYOUT-B,HOME-B,ANG-B,VUE-B,REACT-B,VANILLA-B,WC-B,TS-B,JQ-B,SVELTE-B "npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app run build:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app run build:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app run build:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app run build:single-spa:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app run build:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app run build:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vanilla-app run build:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-webcomponents-app run build:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-typescript-app run build:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-jquery-app run build:prod" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-svelte-app run build:prod"
scripts.dev:build:apps: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n AUTH-B,LAYOUT-B,HOME-B,ANG-B,VUE-B,REACT-B,VANILLA-B,WC-B,TS-B,JQ-B,SVELTE-B "npm --prefix ../single-spa-auth-app run build -- --mode development" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-layout-app run build -- --mode development" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-home-app run build -- --mode development --watch" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-angular-app run build:single-spa -- --watch" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vue-app run build -- --mode development" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-react-app run build -- --mode development --watch" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-vanilla-app run build -- --mode development --watch" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-webcomponents-app run build -- --mode development --watch" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-typescript-app run build -- --mode development --watch" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-jquery-app run build -- --mode development --watch" "npm --prefix ../single-spa-svelte-app run build -- --mode development --watch"
scripts.dev:serve:apps: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n AUTH-S,LAYOUT-S,HOME-S,ANG-S,VUE-S,REACT-S,VANILLA-S,WC-S,TS-S,JQ-S,SVELTE-S "npx http-server ../single-spa-auth-app/dist -p 4201 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-layout-app/dist -p 4202 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-home-app/dist -p 4203 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-angular-app/dist -p 4204 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-vue-app/dist -p 4205 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-react-app/dist -p 4206 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-vanilla-app/dist -p 4207 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-webcomponents-app/dist -p 4208 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-typescript-app/dist -p 4209 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-jquery-app/dist -p 4210 -c-1 --cors" "npx http-server ../single-spa-svelte-app/dist -p 4211 -c-1 --cors"
scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "ROOT,BUILD,SERVE-MFES" "npm run serve:root" "npm run dev:build:apps" "npm run dev:serve:apps"
scripts.serve:build:concurrently: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "ROOT,BUILD,SERVE-MFES" "npm run serve:root" "npm run dev:build:apps" "npm run dev:serve:apps"
scripts.serve:dev:build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "ROOT,BUILD,SERVE-MFES" "npm run serve:root" "npm run dev:build:apps" "npm run dev:serve:apps"
scripts.serve:dev:build:concurrently: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "ROOT,BUILD,SERVE-MFES" "npm run serve:root" "npm run dev:build:apps" "npm run dev:serve:apps"
scripts.serve:prod:build: npm run prod:build:apps && npm run build:prod && npm run serve:root:prod
scripts.serve:prod:build:concurrently: npm run prod:build:apps:concurrently && npm run build:prod && npm run serve:root:prod

author: Cesar Francisco Chavez Maldonado
